outboundMessages.name: Inside Sales Closed Won KPI-Lead Admin

rules.description: Set the Account Classification and Account Status to Customer and Active when Opportunity goes to Closed Won

rules.fullName: Alert Roadnet Sales Ops on Sales Complete
rules.description: When an opportunity goes to Sales Complete, Roadnet's Sales Ops gets alerted.

rules.fullName: Alert to Sales for Mexico Opportunities
rules.formula: AND ( Opportunity_Country__c == 'MX', OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'MQL'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sales Acceptance'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Develop'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Prove'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Negotiate') ), ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c = True, OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED (ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c )) )

rules.fullName: Alert when Omnitracs Mexico Opportunity is Closed Won
rules.description: Alert when Omnitracs Mexico Opportunity is Closed Won

rules.fullName: Alert when Roadnet Opportunity is Closed Won
rules.description: Alert when Roadnet Opportunity is Closed Won

rules.fullName: Alert when Roadnet Opportunity is Lost
rules.description: Alert when Roadnet Opportunity is Lost

rules.fullName: Alert when XRS CMPP Eval selected
rules.description: When a sales team members sets up a XRS CMPP Eval, the new opportunity triggers a notification of the child opportunity to the email distribution of XRS.Eval@omnitracs.com.

rules.fullName: Alert when XRS Indirect Opportunity is Closed Won
rules.description: Notification to the Opportunity Owner (VAR) when XRS Indirect Opportunity moves to Close Won.
Updates BDR qualified date for the channel after 45 days
The field should populate the name of the creating user on creation only, given that their title contains "business dev" or "lead dev"

rules.fullName: Change in Next Steps - Create Task to update Days from last activity
rules.description: Change in Next Steps field will create a Task to update Days from last activity to 0

rules.fullName: Closed Won with Legal Review %26 Finance Status Approved - Decommission
rules.description: When an RN Opportunity for a decommission goes to Closed Won with Legal Review & Finance Status approved
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Owner.Business_Unit__c, 'Roadnet')&& ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won') && ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,'Decommission')&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Order_Sub_Type__c,'Annual Increase'))&& ISPICKVAL(Legal_Review__c,'Approved') && ISPICKVAL(Finance_Status__c,'Approved')

rules.description: When Opp Order Type is Customer Portal and Primary Quote is Approved and New Stage = Sales Complete on Save, set Financial review and Legal Status to Approved and Stage to Closed Won.

rules.fullName: Email Notification - EMEA oppotunity stage is changed
rules.description: Notify Kevin Hudson when an EMEA opportunity stage is changed

rules.fullName: Email PAMs when Opp is assigned to Partner Account Manager
rules.description: Sends a notification email when an opportunity is assigned to Partner Account Manager User. Deactivating as new workflow added: Opportunity Assigned - Alert

rules.fullName: Email Partner Reseller when Opp Assigned from PAM to Partner Reseller
rules.description: Sends a notification email when an opportunity is assigned to Partner Account Manager User.
Set the "Date/Time Finance Review Completed" field with the current date/time when Finance Status = Approved
Evaluate an Opportunity to determine if it is still open. Set a time-based workflow to notify the Opportunity owner the Close Date has passed.
Update Forecast Demand to Omitted 0%-30% when Probability is between 0%-50%
Update Forecast Demand to Commit 90% when Probability is 100
Update Forecast Demand to Pipeline 30%-50% when Probability is between 50-70
Update Forecast Demand to Best Case 70% when Probability is between 70-90
Update Forecast Demand to Commit 90% when Probability is between 90-100

rules.fullName: Forecast Demand Closed based on Stage
rules.description: Changes the Forecast Demand % to Closed field when Stage field is set on Opportunity.
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs.
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs.
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs.

criteriaItems.value: Business Development Associate,Business Development Lead,Business Development Rep,Inside Sales Rep

rules.description: Workflow for InsideSales KPI.
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs. Sends data to ISDC Power Standings for qualified opps.
Used by InsideSales application to pass data for KPIs.
Used by InsideSales Playbooks application to pass data for KPIs.

rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED( LeadSource ), AND(ISNEW(), NOT(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource ,"")) )) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Lead Source Most Recent Change
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED( Lead_Source_Most_Recent__c ), AND(ISNEW(), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source_Most_Recent__c ,"")) )) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A Identify if Stage Reversal Approval Reqd
rules.description: Identifies if approval is required, when opportunity stage is moved back. This WFR should not be converted into a process flow, since there is a dependent process flow.
rules.formula: AND ( ISCHANGED(Probability), Probability < PRIORVALUE( Probability ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost")), TCV__c >= 10000, NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Partner_Opportunity_Reseller"), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(OR($Profile.Name == 'Contracts',$Profile.Name == 'Contracts - Admin', $Profile.Name == 'AR/Billing')) )

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A Notify Owner if stage reversed from Sales Complete
rules.description: Notifies Opportunity owner when legal/contracts change stage from Sales Complete to Negotiate
rules.formula: AND ( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( StageName ), "Sales Complete"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), OR($Profile.Name == 'Contracts',$Profile.Name == 'Contracts - Admin',$Profile.Name == 'AR/Billing') )

rules.description: Develop Date value captures the date when Stage was "Develop"
Negotiate Date value captures the date when Stage was "Negotiate"
Sales Acceptance Date value captures the date when Stage was "Sales Acceptance"
Sets the opportunity based on the fleet size of the lead
Email Alert sent Professional Services Team when an Opportunity is Closed Won.
Email Alert sent Professional Services Team when an Opportunity is Sales Complete

rules.fullName: ProServ Alert When RDC MTA is Quoted
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), RDC_MTA_Quoted__c = TRUE, NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Date_Migration"), NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Eval"), $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = FALSE)

rules.fullName: RN - Closed Won Email Alert to CS and PM
rules.description: Closed Won alert sent to CS and PM reps, for when an opp owners BU is RN.

rules.fullName: Renewal Opp Only -- Finance Review Set to Customer Setup
rules.description: Workflow for Renewal opportunities only (where Sylectus is not the primary business unit or if there are XRS opportunity products). Workflow to automatically approve AR for Scott Woitas Team.
Owned by Sales. Needed for reporting. Historical Stamps to capture the Owner values prior to the opportunity going closed.
rules.formula: AND ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")), OR (ISCHANGED(OwnerId ), ISNEW()) )

rules.description: Set the Last Assigned (from PAM) to Partner Name date field once the opportunity owner is changed from a PAM user to a Partner user
Set the Last Assigned (from PAM) to Partner Name date field once the opportunity owner is changed from a PAM user to a Partner user

rules.fullName: Set Legal Review on Sales Complete
Set Opportunity Close Date for Closed Lost
rules.description: Set the opp closed date to today for closed lost

rules.booleanFilter: ((((1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 4 AND 5) OR (6) AND 7) AND 8) OR 9)
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Negotiate based on the Opportunities Record type, Order type and Sub-Order Type when created

rules.fullName: Set Opportunity Stage--Sales Acceptance on Create
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR ( 1 AND 4 AND 5) AND 6
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Sales Acceptance based on the Opportunities Record type, Order type and Sub-Order Type when created

rules.fullName: Set SB Contracted Checkbox - Steelbrick CPQ
rules.description: WF rule to set the SteelBrick contracted checkbox to true.

rules.fullName: Set Subscription ARPU and Product Name to Blank when Product Type %3D Application
rules.description: Set Product Name and Subscription ARPU to Null when Product Type= Application or Technical Services
Workflow used to launch actions for opportunities created as renewals within term.

rules.fullName: Transfer owner to Marketo Interface for closed opportunities
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7

criteriaItems.value: Partner Opportunity (Reseller),Eval,"Products, Services and Maintenance",Renewal Only,Services Only

rules.description: Transfer owner to Partner Account Manager for Omni Partner closed opportunities and also associated Account for Non-Roadnet Partners

rules.fullName: Update Decommission Opportunity when Stage is Closed Won

rules.description: Update the Demo Status field to Scheduled when Opportunity goes to Prove.
When opportunity goes to Closed Won, *Forecast Category is updated to Closed
Every time the close date is pushed to a later date which is more than 30 days later to the current date increment the push counter field
rules.formula: AND ( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), CloseDate - PRIORVALUE (CloseDate) > 30) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: Update Stage to Closed Won during Finance Approval
rules.formula: (ISCHANGED(Finance_Status__c)||ISCHANGED(Legal_Review__c)|| ISCHANGED(Primary_Quote_Approval_Status__c)||ISCHANGED(Order_Type__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Finance_Status__c, 'Approved') && ISPICKVAL(Legal_Review__c, 'Approved') && Primary_Quote_Approval_Status__c = "Approved" && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c, "Auto Renewal With Increase")))

rules.fullName: VVSS - Email Alert to Owner When SP not Complete %28VVSS Required%29
VVSS - Opportunity Sales Complete %28VVSS not Required%29
VVSS - Opt Out for all Partner Account RTs
VVSS - Set Opp Stage to Negotiate on Create
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Negotiate based on the Opportunities Record Type, Type Order type and Sub-Order Type when created
rules.formula: OR( (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && (ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Transfer") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"AddOn") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Customer Portal") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Decommission") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Reactivation"))), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Data_Migration", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Renewal", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Services_Only")

rules.fullName: VVSS - Set Opp Stage to Prove on Create
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Prove based on the Opportunities Record Type, Type Order type and Sub-Order Type when created
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Customer") && OR( ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"New"), ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Migration"))

rules.fullName: VVSS - Set Opportunity Stage to MQL on Create
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Sales Acceptance based on the Opportunities Record type, Order type and Sub-Order Type when created
rules.formula: AND( OR($Profile.Name = "Marketing - User 2", $Profile.Name = "Marketing - User 3"), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Partner_Opportunity_Reseller", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Eval", (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && ISPICKVAL(Type,"New Customer") && (ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Transfer") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"New"))), (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && ISPICKVAL(Type,"Prior Customer"))))

rules.fullName: VVSS - Set Opportunity Stage to Sales Acceptance on Create
rules.description: Set the Opportunity Stage Sales Acceptance based on the Opportunities Record type, Order type and Sub-Order Type when created
rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Partner_Opportunity_Reseller", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Eval", (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && ISPICKVAL(Type,"New Customer") && (ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"Transfer") || ISPICKVAL(Order_Type__c,"New"))), (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_and_Services" && ISPICKVAL(Type,"Prior Customer"))), OR($Profile.Name <> "Marketing - User 2", $Profile.Name <> "Marketing - User 3"))
